knimeNode.name: Maximum Finder
knimeNode.shortDescription: Find local maxima on an n-dimensional image.

intro.p: MaximumFinder runs over an image, finds points which are larger than all of it's neighbors and finally iterates over these points to find the real local maxima.
To find minima instead, you might want to invert the input.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Sets the tolerance for comparison of two pixels. This is useful when an image is affected by unwanted noise.
Suppression in MaximumFinder removes maxima which are closer than the suppression value. This comes at the cost of a little more computation time.
Will mark tolerance areas instead of single points only.
